title: Bistro Natural
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Western, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a varied menu that includes vegan choices. Serves breakfast and lunch which includes sandwiches and gluten free bread. A variety of juices and smoothies, as well as coffee, masala chai and herbal teas are available.
streetAddress: Estrada dos Bandeirantes 24047 Loja B Vargem Grande
